title: Border crossings by Venezuelans decline as Biden starts deportations
description: Illegal border crossings by Venezuelans have dropped 50 to 60 percent since the Biden administration announced it would begin deportation flights

title: Hamas tunnels under Gaza stretch miles, holding hostages and weapons
description: Far below densely populated neighborhoods, a network of tunnels poses a distinct challenge to any large-scale Israeli ground operation to strike at Hamas.

title: Hurricane Otis smashes into Acapulco as a Category 5 storm
description: As recently as Monday, Otis was expected to be a run-of-the-mill tropical storm. On Tuesday, it intensified faster than any eastern Pacific storm on record.

title: Fearing war and unrest, Arab leaders demand end to Israeli assault on Gaza
description: Arab governments stood by for years as the U.S.-led peace process collapsed and Palestinian suffering festered. Now they are grappling with a calamity in the Middle East.

title: Israel says Gaza ground assault to come. But first is battle over risks.
description: A ground offensive once seemed inevitable. That was before realities took hold, including the perils of urban combat and touching off a wider conflict.

title: Calls rising globally for pause in Israel-Gaza violence to allow in aid
description: As Israeli officials call for the resignation of the U.N. general secretary and expulsion of hostile U.N. diplomats, the leader of Turkey harshly denounced the airstrikes on Gaza.

title: Live updates: Hurricane Otis makes landfall near Acapulco after extreme intensification
description: Otis grew from a tropical storm Tuesday morning to Category 5 by evening. Follow live updates

title: Separated by Gaza war, Palestinian families live in fear of the next call
description: From Washington to the West Bank, separated families have spent hours each day desperately trying to connect with relatives.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Israel rejects cease-fire calls; U.S. to send Iron Dome systems
description: Israel lambasted U.N. Secretary General António Guterres and others for calling for a cease-fire during a Security Council meeting on the war with Hamas.

title: Hurricane Otis tracker: Map and projected storm path
description: We’re tracking the path of Hurricane Otis. Explore our maps, forecasts, and predictions of the storm.

title: Back-channel talks keep Ukraine and Russia in contact, despite war
description: There is little hope for negotiations to end the war but Russia and Ukraine have managed to engage on exchanging POWs and other issues, at times through intermediaries.

title: Israel says Hamas ‘is ISIS.’ But it’s not.
description: Given the scale and horror of Hamas’s carnage, the invocation of ISIS is not surprising. But scholars of the Middle East contend that such rhetoric deliberately flattens the deep forces at play.

title: Hurricane Otis explodes into Category 5 storm ahead of Acapulco landfall
description: “A nightmare scenario is unfolding for southern Mexico,” the National Hurricane Center wrote after the northeast Pacific’s fastest storm strengthening on record.
